articles.title: Major fire breaks out at French plant housing lithium batteries - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Some 900 tonnes of lithium batteries were on fire at a battery recycling plant in southern France, authorities said on Sunday, sending a cloud of thick black smoke into the sky above the site.
articles.content: Some 900 tonnes of lithium batteries were on fire at a battery recycling plant in southern France, authorities said on Sunday, sending a cloud of thick black smoke into the sky above the site.  The f… [+1633 chars]

articles.title: The EU is reportedly set to hit Apple with a $539 million fine in antitrust probe - Engadget
articles.description: Apple may be fined $539 million (500 million euros) and hit with a ban from the EU on alleged anti-competitive App Store practices, stemming from a complaint...
articles.content:
